ch.uzh.ifi.seal.changedistiller.distilling.refactoring

类 AbstractRefactoringHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.ifi.seal.changedistiller.distilling.refactoring.AbstractRefactoringHelper
  • 直接已知子类:
    ClassRefactoringHelper, FieldRefactoringHelper, MethodRefactoringHelper

    public abstract class AbstractRefactoringHelper
extends Object
    Refactoring helpers support Distiller in deciding whether an added and a deleted class/field/method represent a refactoring. The helpers for the different StructureNode have to extend this class to be conform to the Distiller.

    Since the Distiller assumes that the refactoring helper updates the ClassHistory in which the refactorings took place, heirs of this class have to fulfill that all StructureEntityVersion generations are made via the provided ClassHistory.

    作者:
    Beat Fluri, Giacomo Ghezzi
    另请参阅:
    ClassRefactoringHelper, FieldRefactoringHelper, MethodRefactoringHelper

        public AbstractRefactoringHelper(ClassHistory classHistory,

        Creates a new refactoring helper.
        参数:
        classHistory - on which the helper creates new StructureEntityVersions
        astHelper - that helps the refactoring helper

        返回:

      • createStructureEntityVersionWithID

                                                                          String version)
        Creates a StructureEntityVersion for the given StructureNode and attaches it to the ClassHistory.
        参数:
        node - to create the structure entity version
        version - the number or ID associated to the structure entity version
        返回:
        structure entity version for the structure node

      • createStructureEntityVersion

        public abstract StructureEntityVersion createStructureEntityVersion(StructureNode node,
                                                                    String newEntityName)
        Creates a StructureEntityVersion with newEntityName and replaces the StructureEntityVersion of the StructureNode (if exists) with it in the ClassHistory. took place.
        参数:
        node - to create the structure entity version
        newEntityName - of the new structure entity version
        返回:
        structure entity with newEntityName and the modifiers that is a replacement of the structure entity version of the structure node

      • isRefactoring

        public final boolean isRefactoring(StructureNode left,
                                   StructureNode right)
        Checks whether an old and a new entity are subject of a refactoring. Whether it is a refactoring or not is decided according to the similarity implementation and the given threshold.
        参数:
        left - the old entity
        right - the new entity
        返回:
        true if the two entities are subject of a refactoring, false otherwise

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(double threshold)
        Sets the threshold for the similarity calculation.
        参数:
        threshold - for the similarity calculation

      • similarity

        public abstract double similarity(StructureNode left,
                                  StructureNode right)
        Calculates the similarity between two entities represented by their names and the string representation of them.
        参数:
        left - the old entity
        right - the new entity
        返回:
        similarity value the two entities; 1.0 is the highest, 0.0 the lowest similarity value
